verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Salamu Mama yetu Maria,
Bikira na mwombezi wetu mwema,
Wewe ni kinga yetu,
ni msimamizi wetu na
Mama wa Huruma,
(Mama Maria).

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Maria mtakatifu,
Mama wa Mkombozi tunalia sikia,
tunalalamika;
Maombi yetu Mama,
uyasikie na uyafikishe
kwa mwanao Yesu. x2

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Njia hatuioni twendako
hatujui Maria taa yetu,
Tulinde hatarini utufikishe vema,
Wewe ni ngao yetu,
(Mama Maria)

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Safari Yetu ndefu uchovu
unazidi Mama tutie nguvu,
Mawimbi ni makali dhoruba
mvua kali
Tunaishiwa nguvu,
(Mama Maria)

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Nyosha mkono wako tukinge
na mauti na dhambi tuepushe.
Mlango tufungulie tumwone
Yesu Kristu
Ee Mama tufikishe
(Mama Maria)
